title: Grid
name: Grid
description:
Used inside cfform, cfgrid lets you place a grid control in a form. A grid control is
  	a table of data divided into rows and columns. The cfgrid tag column data is specified with cfgridcolumn tags.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: A name for the grid element.

attributes.name: format
attributes.description: Height value of the grid control, in pixels.

attributes.name: height
attributes.description: Height value of the grid control, in pixels.

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: Width value of the grid control, in pixels.

attributes.name: autoWidth
attributes.description:
Optional. Yes or No. Default is No.
	If Yes, automatically sets the width of each column so that all the columns are visible within the
	grid's specified width. All columns are initially set to equal widths. Users can resize any column.
	No horizontal scroll bars are available since all columns are visible.

attributes.name: vSpace
attributes.description: Vertical margin spacing above and below the grid control, in pixels.

attributes.name: hSpace
attributes.description: Horizontal margin spacing to the left and right of the grid control, in pixels.

attributes.name: align
attributes.description:
Alignment value. Options are: Top, Left, Bottom, Baseline, Texttop, Absbottom, Middle,
	Absmiddle, Right.

attributes.name: query
attributes.description: Name of the query associated with the grid control.

attributes.name: insert
attributes.description: Yes lets end users insert row data into the grid. Default is No.

attributes.name: delete
attributes.description: Yes lets end users delete row data from the grid. Default is No.

attributes.name: sort
attributes.description:
If Yes, sort buttons are added to the grid control. When clicked, sort buttons perform a simple
	text sort on the selected column. Default is No.
	Note that columns are sortable by clicking the column head, even if no sort button is displayed.

attributes.name: font
attributes.description: Font to use for column data in the grid control.

attributes.name: fontSize
attributes.description: Font size for text in the grid control, in points.

attributes.name: italic
attributes.description: Yes displays grid control text in italic. Default is No.

attributes.name: bold
attributes.description: Yes displays grid control text in boldface. Default is No.

attributes.name: textColor
attributes.description:
Color value for text in the grid control. Options are: black (default), magenta, cyan, orange, darkgray,
		pink, gray, white, lightgray, yellow. A hex value can be entered in the form: textColor = "##xxxxxx" where x is 0-9 or A-F. Use two
		pound signs or no pound signs.

attributes.name: href
attributes.description:
URL to associate with the grid item or a query column for a grid that is populated from a query.
		If href is a query column, the href value is populated by the query. If href is not recognized as a
		query column, it is assumed that the href text is an actual HTML href.

attributes.name: hrefKey
attributes.description:
The name of a query column when the grid uses a query. The column specified becomes the Key
		regardless of the select mode for the grid.

attributes.name: target
attributes.description: Target attribute for href URL.

attributes.name: appendKey
attributes.description:
When used with href, Yes passes query string value of the selected tree item in the URL to the
		application page specified in the cfform action attribute. Default is Yes.

attributes.name: highlightHref
attributes.description:
Yes highlights links associated with a cfgrid with an href attribute value. No disables
		highlight. Default is Yes.

attributes.name: onValidate
attributes.description:
The name of a JavaScript function used to validate user input. The form object, input object,
		and input object value are passed to the routine, which should return True if validation succeeds and
		False otherwise.

attributes.name: onError
attributes.description: The name of a JavaScript function to execute in the event of a failed validation.

attributes.name: gridDataAlign
attributes.description: Enter Left, Right, or Center to position data in the grid within a column. Default is Left.

attributes.name: gridLines
attributes.description:
Yes or No. Yes enables row and column rules (lines) in the grid control. No suppresses rules.
		Default is Yes.

attributes.name: rowHeight
attributes.description:
Number of pixels for the minimum row height of the grid control. Used with cfgridcolumn
		type = "Image", you can use rowHeight to define enough space for graphics to display in the row.

attributes.name: rowHeaders
attributes.description:
Yes or No. Yes displays a column of numeric row labels in the grid control.
		Defaults to Yes.

attributes.name: rowHeaderAlign
attributes.description: Enter Left, Right, or Center to position data within a row header. Default is Left.

attributes.name: rowHeaderFont
attributes.description: Font to use for the row label.

attributes.name: rowHeaderFontSize
attributes.description: Size for row label text in the grid control, in points.

attributes.name: rowHeaderItalic
attributes.description: Yes or No. Yes displays row label text in italic. Default is No.

attributes.name: rowHeaderBold
attributes.description: Yes or No. Yes displays row label text in boldface. Default is No.

attributes.name: rowHeaderTextColor
attributes.description:
Text color value for the grid control row headers. Entries are: black (default), magenta, cyan,
		orange, darkgray, pink, gray, white, lightgray, yellow. A hex value can be entered in the form: rowHeaderTextColor = "##xxxxxx"
		Where x is 0-9 or A-F. Use two pound signs or no pound signs.

attributes.name: rowHeaderWidth
attributes.description: The width, in pixels, of the row header column.

attributes.name: colHeaders
attributes.description: Yes or No. Yes displays column headers in the grid control. Default is Yes.

attributes.name: colHeaderAlign
attributes.description: Enter Left, Right, or Center to position data within a column header. Default is Left.

attributes.name: colHeaderFont
attributes.description: Font for the column header in the grid control.

attributes.name: colHeaderFontSize
attributes.description: Size for column header text in the grid control, in points.

attributes.name: colHeaderItalic
attributes.description: Yes or No. Yes displays column header text in italic. Default is No.

attributes.name: colHeaderBold
attributes.description: Yes or No. Yes displays column header text in boldface. Default is No.

attributes.name: colHeaderTextColor
attributes.description:
Color value for the grid control column headers. Valid entries are: black (default), magenta,
		cyan, orange, darkgray, pink, gray, white, lightgray, yellow.A hex value can be entered in the form:
		colHeaderTextColor = "##xxxxxx"
		where x is 0-9 or A-F. Use either two pound signs or no pound signs.

attributes.name: bgColor
attributes.description:
Background color value for the grid control. Entries are: black, magenta, cyan,
		orange, darkgray, pink, gray, white, lightgray, yellow. A hex value can be entered in the form: bgColor = "##xxxxxx"
		where x is 0-9 or A-F. Use either two pound signs or no pound signs.

attributes.name: selectColor
attributes.description: Background color for a selected item. See bgColor for color options.

attributes.name: selectMode
attributes.description: Selection mode for items in the grid control.

attributes.name: maxRows
attributes.description: Specifies the maximum number of rows to display in the grid.

attributes.name: notSupported
attributes.description: Selection mode for items in the grid control.

attributes.name: pictureBar
attributes.description:
Yes or No. If Yes, images are used for the Insert, delete, and Sort buttons rather than text.
		Default is No.

attributes.name: insertButton
attributes.description: Text to use for the Insert action button. The default is Insert.

attributes.name: deleteButton
attributes.description: Text to use for the delete action button. The default is delete.

attributes.name: sortAscendingButton
attributes.description: Text to use for the Sort button. Default is "A - Z".

attributes.name: sortDescendingButton
attributes.description: Text to use for the Sort button. Default is "Z - A".

attributes.name: enabled
attributes.description:
Flash only: Boolean value specifying
            whether the control is enabled. A disabled
            control appears in light gray.
            Default: true

attributes.name: onChange
attributes.description:
Flash only: ActionScript to run when the control changes
            due to user action in the control.

attributes.name: style
attributes.description:
Flash only: Must be a style specification in CSS format.
            Ignored for type="text".

attributes.name: tooltip
attributes.description:
Flash only: text to display when the
            mouse pointer hovers over the control.

attributes.name: visible
attributes.description:
Flash only: Boolean value specifying
            whether to show the control. Space that would
            be occupied by an invisible control is blank.
            Default: true

attributes.name: onBlur
attributes.description: ActionScript that runs when the grid loses focus.

attributes.name: onFocus
attributes.description: ActionScript that runs when the grid gets focus.
